name.en: Elemental HERO Flame Wingman - Infernal Rage
name.ja: <ruby>Ｅ・ＨＥＲＯ<rt>エレメンタルヒーロー</rt></ruby> フレイム・ウィングマン－フレイム・シュート
name.ja_romaji: Erementaru Hīrō Fureimu Winguman - Fureimu Shūto

text.en:
2 "Elemental HERO" monsters with different Attributes
Must be Fusion Summoned. If this card is Special Summoned: You can add 1 "Favorite" card from your Deck or GY to your hand. You can Tribute this card Fusion Summoned using a Normal Monster(s) as material; Special Summon 1 Level 7 or lower "Elemental HERO" monster that cannot be Normal Summoned/Set from your Deck or Extra Deck, ignoring its Summoning conditions. You can only use each effect of "Elemental HERO Flame Wingman - Infernal Rage" once per turn.

ja.set_name: The Valuable Book EX 3 promotional cards
